headline: A Look At SLB (SLB) Valuation After Kuwait Oil Company Awards US$1.5b Mutriba Contract
summary: SLB (SLB) just secured a US$1.5 billion, five-year integrated contract from Kuwait Oil Company for the Mutriba field, extending its role into full field design, development, and production management. See our latest analysis for SLB. That Kuwait contract lands at a time when SLB’s share price has already been moving higher, with a 30 day share price return of 13.48% and a 90 day share price return of 35.05%. The 5 year total shareholder return of 109.01% contrasts with a flat 3 year record,...
